entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
